item.title: publication
item.description:
Please refer to Google Scholar for the latest udpates.

  • End to End Security in Service Oriented Architecture. M. Azarmi, P. Angin, B. Bhargava, N. Ahmed , A. Sinclair, et al. 31st International Symposium on Reliable Distributed Systems (IEEE SRDS 2012), 2012, Under Submission.
  • Novel Secure and Dynamic Clustering Protocols in Wireless Sensor Networks. R. Jiang, M. Azarmi, T. Gong, B. Bhargava. Elsevier Computers & Security, 2011, Under Review.
  • Minimizing Collaborative Attacks in a Real Heterogeneous Mobile Ad Hoc Network Using Cooperative Immunization Model. T. Gong, B. Bhargava, Jiajia Zhou, Mehdi Azarmi, and Changxing Du. Computers & Security, 2011, Under Review.
  • Privacy-Aware Location-Aided Routing in Mobile Ad Hoc Networks. G. Ghinita, M. Azarmi, E. Bertino. 11th International Conference on Mobile Data Management. (IEEE MDM 2010), 2010, 65-74.
  • Developing Attack Defense Ideas for Ad Hoc Wireless Networks. R. Oliveira, B. Bhargava, M. Azarmi, E. Ferreira. 28th IEEE International Symposium on Reliable Distributed Systems (SRDS), Niagara Falls, New York, U.S.A., September 2009.
  • Collaborative Attacks in WiMAX Networks B. Bhargava, Y. Zhang, N. Idika, L. Lilien, M. Azarmi Wiley Journal on Security and Communication Networks, Volume: 2, Issue: 5, Pages: 373-391, 2009.
  • An Adaptive Routing Protocols for Vehicular Ad hoc Networks. M. Azarmi, Masoud Sabaei. International Symposium on Telecommunication (IST 2008), 2008.
  • A Cross Layer and Power-aware Routing Protocol for Sensor Networks. M. Azarmi, S. Khorsandi, H. Pedram. Proceedings of 15th Iranian Conference on Electrical Engineering (ICEE 2007), 2007.
  • CPR: A Cross Layer and power-aware routing protocol for sensor networks. M. Azarmi, M. Sabaei. Proceedings of 12th International CSI Computer Conference, 2007.
  • The Effect of the Mobility Models On The Mobile Ad hoc Network Routing Protocols. M. Azarmi, M. Sabaei. Proceedings of International Knowledge and Technology conference (IKT2005), Tehran, IRAN, 2005.
  • Improving Location-Based Routing Protocols in Mobile Ad hoc Networks. M. Azarmi M.Sc thesis, Amirkabir University of Technology (Tehran Polytechnic), 2006.
  • A Performance Comparison of Multi-Hop Wireless Ad Hoc Network Routing Protocols. M. Azarmi B.Sc thesis, Amirkabir University of Technology (Tehran Polytechnic), 2005.

item.title: About
item.description:
I received my Ph.D. in computer science from Purdue University. I was affiliated with the Center for Education and Research in Information Assurance and Security (CERIAS).

I’m currently interested in designing reliable and massively scalable distributed systems. Previously, I’ve worked on multiple areas of information security.

item.title: Code
item.description:
GitHub

  • rook (An Open, Cloud Native, and Universal Distributed Storage): Implemented the etcd manager to elastically expand and shrink the etcd cluster based on the cluster’s status.
  • discovery service: Improved and expanded the etcd discovery service to reflect the latest cluster membership.
  • distcron: A Distributed Cron.
